title: 1.7.10怎么制作浮空文字&图片
author: LKMLKM
txt_content: 1.7.10怎么制作浮空文字&图片？要1.7.10的！！详细指令！最好有视频或者图文！

replies.author: kid小东
replies.txt_content:
LKMLKM 发表于 2016-10-29 20:57
不行呢！？/summon EntityHorse ~ ~55 ~ {Riding:{id:"WitherSkull",direction:[0.0,0.0,0.0]},Age:-1700000,CustomName:"内容",Invulnerable:1,CustomNameVisible:1}复制代码
我记得MCBBS上好像有吧。。不行的话我再找找。。

replies.author: MC_juxie
replies.txt_content:
[全息显示]HolographicDisplays
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-377628-1-1.html

/hd create <编号> [内容]

replies.author: TNT嘉音
replies.txt_content: 咳咳，劝你改变主意，那浮空字会慢慢升高。
